name: Yes/no
description:
#14
Yes or no? maybe yes? or maybe no?
Sometimes life decisions are difficult to take. We get stuck for hours thinking if it is better to say yes or no to a specific circumstance.
What will you decide? Yes or no?

2048x2048 Mp4 video in a loop of 8 seconds

Piece #14 of the collection: I'm not your therapist but I'd like to cheer you up with my dorky art The series focuses on the fragility of the inner world and brings up topics that we often find in our long journey on earth.
